data.eml:eml: A new species of Boloponera from Sekhukhuneland, South Africa (Hymenoptera, Formicidae, Ponerinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hawkes, Peter G. (2018): A new species of Boloponera from Sekhukhuneland, South Africa (Hymenoptera, Formicidae, Ponerinae). ZooKeys 798: 23-44, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.798.28606, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.798.28606
